name: stdio-context
description: Replace stdin, stdout, and/or stderr, including console methods, with arbitrary streams for capture, redirection, testing, or other purposes.
author: Kevin Locke <kevin@kevinlocke.name>
//: All scripts should run in POSIX sh and Windows cmd.exe

scripts.doc: npm run doc-js && npm run doc-spec
scripts.doc-spec: rimraf doc/spec && mkdir doc/spec && mocha --reporter doc --recursive test | cat doc-src/spec/header.xhtml - doc-src/spec/footer.xhtml >> doc/spec/index.xhtml
scripts.lint: npm run lint-js && npm run lint-doc
scripts.postversion: rimraf doc && git clone -b gh-pages -l -q . doc && npm run doc && git -C doc add . && git -C doc commit -n -m "Docs for version $npm_package_version" && git -C doc push && git push --follow-tags origin master gh-pages && echo Remember to update GitHub Releases from CHANGELOG.md && echo until skywinder/github-changelog-generator#56 is fixed.
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test-unit
scripts.test-cov: npm run lint && npm run test-unit-cov
scripts.version: github_changelog_generator -t "$npm_config_gcg_github_token" && echo Please edit CHANGELOG.md as desired, then exit && $npm_config_shell && git commit -m "Update CHANGELOG.md for $npm_package_version" CHANGELOG.md
scripts.version-deps: npm install david depcheck git-branch-is travis-status
